label: Makeup and Cosmetics
description: Products and tools used for enhancing or altering one's appearance, including foundation, concealer, highlighter, and color corrector.
intents: Find the best foundation for my skin type
Learn how to cover up blemishes
Find the best concealer for dark circles

subcategories.label: Foundation
subcategories.description: A skin-colored makeup applied to the face to create an even, uniform color to the complexion.

subcategories.label: Concealer
subcategories.description: A cosmetic used to mask dark circles, age spots, large pores, and other small blemishes visible on the skin.

subcategories.label: Highlighter
subcategories.description: A cosmetic used to enhance certain features of the face, such as the cheekbones, brow bones, and nose.

subcategories.label: Color Corrector
subcategories.description: A cosmetic used to neutralize discoloration on the skin, such as redness, dark circles, and hyperpigmentation.

subcategories.label: Bronzer
subcategories.description: A cosmetic used to create a sun-kissed glow on the skin.
